long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you happen to send an unintentional email to someone who's out of your organization (here and there) -
the "Don't Send Yet!" is your new savior!

After a short setup, you'll be notified about every email you're about to send to an external party.

By that, you'll avoid sending sensitive or private information to people who shouldn't have received your email in the first place.
